Articles.Content:
This is my 2nd Video, I used Outerra, and Space Engine to make the video. I thought about using KSP, but KSP just didn't fit in well enough in my opinion. Hope you enjoy!!

Song- "East" By The Weather Station.
A very beautiful video. The song wasn't my cup of tea, but none the less I enjoyed it. Outerra... I've never heard of this. How does it compare to space engine? It looks almost.. better.
